jade.gen
Class Gen

java.lang.Object
  jade.gen.Gen
Direct Known Subclasses:
FeatureGen, MapGen
public abstract class Gen
extends java.lang.Object

The base class for random map generators. These generators are generally designed to allow chaining so that in decorator fashion, although decending classes may either disallow or mandate chaining. The Gen will first ask its chained Gen to perform its step, and the perform its own. In this way, generators which place special features can be chained with generators with provided basic levels.

          Initializes a new Gen, with no chaining.

Constructor Detail

Gen

public Gen()
Initializes a new Gen, with no chaining.

Method Detail

generate

public final void generate(World world)
Randomly generates or modifies the world map using the global instance of Dice for random number generation.

Parameters:
world - The World to be modified by the generator

generate

public void generate(World world,
                     Dice dice)
Randomly generates or modifies the world map using the provided Dice for random number generation. This method should always generate the exact same map given dice with identical states (ie reseed just before calling this method).

Parameters:
world - The World to be modified by the generator
dice - the Dice used for random number generation

genStep

protected abstract void genStep(World world,
                                Dice dice)
Performs the modifications of this Gen on the world, using the given Dice for random number generation. This step can be as simple as placing some feature on a map, to actual level generation. This method should always generate the exact same map given dice with identical states.

Parameters:
world - the World to be modified by the generator
dice - the Dice used for random number generation
